content: >this traditional crocheted octagon baby blanket stitched in five harmonizing shades of simply soft® has a lovely personal touch designer marilyn losee engineered the pattern beautifully then added a lovely bit of easy embroidery in the center of the design skill level intermediate materials simply soft 170 g/6 oz 288 m/315 yds 5 colors 1 skein each #9701 white a #9719 soft pink b #9722 plum wine c #9717 orchid d and #9943 lavender blue e size h/8/5mm crochet hook or size to obtain gauge schematics for embroidery are provided *from the pattern * each round of the blanket consists of eight groups of double_crochet stitches separated by corner chain-spaces in most rounds increases are worked in the corners in some rounds decreases are worked to maintain the stitch count and prevent the blanket from flaring too much
